content.text:
# King of Kings (Mandaean prayer)

The King of Kings (, ), or King of All Kings, is a Mandaean prayer. It is numbered as Prayer 176 in E. S. Drower's 1959 version of the Qulasta. It is commonly recited as part of Mandaean daily prayers (brakha).
Text and translation
The Mandaic text below is from Al-Mubaraki (2010), and the English translation below is partially adapted from Gelbert and Lofts (2025).
